channel.title: Projects on Vedang Lad
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Vedang Lad

item.title: The Effect of Activation Functions On Superposition in Toy Models
item.description: An in-depth exploration of how different activation functions influence superposition in neural networks.

item.title: CleaNLP: Detecting Label Errors in General NLP Tasks
item.description: This paper presents a method for identifying label errors in natural language processing (NLP) datasets using the T5 model.

item.title: Building an Efficient Poker Agent Using RL
item.description: In this paper, we apply variations of Deep Q-learning (DQN) and Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) to learn the game of heads-up no-limit Texas Holdâ€™em.

item.title: GRUNet: A Novel Bi-directional RNN for VQA
item.description: We propose a new framework which we call GRUNet. GRUNet is a novel Bi-Directional RNN architecture that combines GRU + RNN + ResNet to effectively combine text and im- age input to answer VQA questions.
